elements.title: News(Top News : President Yoon Suk Yeol announced special pardons for nearly one-thousand-700 offenders, including Samsung Electronics Vice Chairman Lee Jae-yong, but excludes key politicians.) - 2022.08.12 PM5
News(Top News : The death toll from this week's record rainfall in the nation's central region rises to eleven while eight others still remain missing.) - 2022.08.11 PM5
News(Top News : The death toll from torrential rains in the central region, including the greater Seoul area, climbs to nine while seven others remain missing.) - 2022.08.10 PM5
News(Top News : A record heavy rain leaves at least eight people dead and seven others missing in the nation's capital and the surrounding metropolitan areas.) - 2022.08.09 PM5

News(Top News : After returning from vacation, President Yoon Suk Yeol pledges to be mindful of his original intentions for the presidency amid a recent plummeting in his approval rating.) - 2022.08.08 PM5
News(Top News : The nation's first mission tot he moon lifts off and enters its target trajectory to begin a six-month voyage to reach lunar orbit.) - 2022.08.05 PM5

News(Top News : U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi and Nation Assembly Speaker Kim Jin-pyo agree to support their governments' efforts for denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula based on extended deterrence.) - 2022.08.04 PM5

News(Top News : The presidential office calls for peace and stability through dialogue and cooperation as tensions rise in the region with U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's visit to Taiwan.) - 2022.08.03 PM5
